name: Honey Glazed Chicken
author: jbrink1
summary: I received this recipe from a friend of mine and have used this for years. My family requests this one often. It's a light meal that everyone will enjoy. Serve with steamed rice.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite-size pieces
directions: Whisk honey, soy sauce, and red pepper flakes in a bowl
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir chicken in hot oil until lightly brown, about 5 minutes
Pour honey mixture into skillet and continue to cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center and sauce is thickened, about 5 minutes more
